summary: This bill, HR 2301, aims to promote renewable energy development on public lands. It updates national goals for renewable energy production, directs the Secretary of the Interior to designate priority areas and streamline land use planning processes. The bill also addresses permitting for wind and solar projects, establishes a Renewable Energy Resource Conservation Fund, and outlines the disposition of revenues generated from renewable energy projects. It emphasizes coordination with various stakeholders and incorporates environmental considerations.
